title: Iceberg
overview: This stage performance is based on the play by Mikhail Durnenkov written specifically for the actress Julia Aug. She plays the role of a woman named Vera, a fan of Alla Pugacheva. For her, the image of the singer is a cherished Soviet myth without which it is impossible to imagine Russia. After finding out that the Diva has left the country Vera experiences a terrible shock and ends up in a psychiatric hospital.
